short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Run UiPath robots from your browser with saved configurations for easy, repeatable automation.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
UiPath Robot Runner is a Chrome extension that allows users to run UiPath robots directly from the browser, streamlining automation workflows. With UiPath Robot Runner, you can easily connect to UiPath robots, customize configurations, and store settings for future runs.

Once configured, UiPath Robot Runner saves your setup—including Endpoint, Process Name, and API parameters—as well as the last argument’s name and value, locally. This eliminates the need to re-enter details each time, ensuring that each run uses the latest configuration and providing a seamless experience for repeat tasks and custom automations.

Key Features:

Connect and run UiPath robots from your browser.

Save configuration details (e.g., Endpoint, Process Name, and API parameters) for future runs.

Configure and save arguments locally (name and value) for efficient, repeatable automation workflows.

Benefits:

Save time by running robots with pre-saved configurations and arguments.

Streamline automations without re-entering details each time.
